author: SanghyunKo
body: POWHEG VBF & HWJ relval gridpack patch with reduced PDF reweighting sets (thanks to @agrohsje) to resolve a recent performance kill issue in extendedgen relval workflows (ProdMon [log1](https://cmsweb.cern.ch/couchdb/workloadsummary/_design/WorkloadSummary/_show/histogramByWorkflow/asikdar_RVCMSSW_10_2_0VBFToH4l_NLO_Pow_JHU_13TeV_py8__gcc7_gen_180715_220414_5082), [log2](https://cmsweb.cern.ch/couchdb/workloadsummary/_design/WorkloadSummary/_show/histogramByWorkflow/asikdar_RVCMSSW_10_2_0VBFToH4l_NLO_Pow_JHU_13TeV_py8__gcc7_gen_180715_220414_5082)).
title: POWHEG VBF & HWJ relval gridpack patch
